raw_body:
FERNANDO – ANTHONY CARL. Son of the late Felix and Etta Fernando,​ loving brother of Audrey and brother-in-law of the late Quintus de S. Wijeyeratne,​ beloved uncle of Sriyan and Geraldine,​ Samantha,​ Sanith and Ashuntha,​ Surein and Anushka,​ cherished granduncle of Ashinsa and Nishan,​ Rashmi,​ Sahein,​ Chelan,​ Shanya and Shevin,​ passed away peacefully on the 18th April. His remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Saturday 20th April from 8 a.m. – 1 p.m. Cremation on same day at Mount Lavinia Cemetery at 2 p.m.
025845
